column4: Whenever I boot my wireless doesn't work until I 'deactivate' and then 'activate' my wlan connection     (before I also had to do "iwconfig wlan0 mode managed"  but I put that in a startup script)
what's the easiest/best way to update firefox?
yeah
It won
and I will tell you WHY
whaat?
A lot of packages depend on Firefox for HTML rendering, CSS, etc. So upgrading Firefox touches more packages than you would think
so I shouldn't touch it?  just wait for the ubuntu update?
you can...install alongside the Breezy Firefox
arg..  I shouldn't update firefox?
that method will basically put two versions of Firefox on your system
the link spiregrain gave says it's not recommended, (as you said, it breaks some things)
yah
so I'll avoid it
unless there is some killer thing you need in 1.5, I'd stick with 1.0.7
when you update ubuntu it updates firefox?
yah
is there a difference between windows and linux firefox profiles? can I migrate my windows profile to here?
I don't know I haven't touched windows in over 6 months
some of them are
